lab2

类 Atom

  • java.lang.Object
    • lab2.Atom

  • public class Atom
extends java.lang.Object
    Model of an atom.
    作者:
    yuxiangc

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Atom(int givenProtons, int givenNeutrons, int givenElectrons)
      Generate an atom with given amount of protons, neutrons and electrons.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void decay()
      Decreases the number of protons by 2 and the number of neutrons by 2.
      int getAtomicCharge()
      Return the value of the atomic charge.
      int getAtomicMass()
      Return the amount of the atomic mass.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Atom

        public Atom(int givenProtons,
    int givenNeutrons,
    int givenElectrons)
        Generate an atom with given amount of protons, neutrons and electrons.
        参数:
        givenProtons - The amount of protons.
        givenNeutrons - The amount of neutrons.
        givenElectrons - The amount of electrons.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAtomicMass

        public int getAtomicMass()
        Return the amount of the atomic mass.
        返回:
        the atomic mass.

      • getAtomicCharge

        public int getAtomicCharge()
        Return the value of the atomic charge.
        返回:
        the atomic charge.

      • decay

        public void decay()
        Decreases the number of protons by 2 and the number of neutrons by 2.
